rules.description: Map Left Option plus h/j/k/l to Arrows
Ctrl+f/b and opt + HJKL to left/down/up/right_arrow
caps lock -> escape(alone) and caps lock -> control
simultaneous j l press to F1

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "Raycast: Store"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "Raycast: Store"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "Global Warp"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "Global Warp"'

rules.description: Ctrl+f/b and opt + HJKL to left/down/up/right_arrow
left control -> eacape(alone) and caps lock -> contrl
caps lock -> escape(alone) and caps lock -> control
simultaneous j l press to F1

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "Raycast: Store"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "Raycast: Store"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "Global Warp"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "Global Warp"'
